bloging.main: 11 clocking in apps for your business
bloging.text: We’ve come a long way since the 1880s when the first mechanical time recorder to punch in and out was invented. But, although technologies have changed, the need to keep up with your team’s hours has stayed the same. So this is where clocking in apps come in.
